item.title: I-90 East - Exit 201
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 201. Use Exit 201 for Anaconda (via MT-48).

item.title: End MT-48 at I-90
item.description: End MT-48 at I-90 (Exit 201). Use I-90 East to Butte; I-90 West to Missoula.

item.description: MT-48 East at I-90 Access Road in Warm Springs.

item.title: MT-48 East - Warm Springs State Hospital
item.description: Warm Springs State Hospital on MT-48 East.

item.title: End MT-48 East at Frontage Road (To I-90)
item.description: End MT-48 East at Frontage Road. Turn left on Frontage Road for I-90.
